sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛First name,

This email is to inform you that your MetroTime role has been updated to Trigger➛...➛Role Type. 

If this is correct, please review the Knowledgebase articles on how to properly perform your role. 

If this is incorrect, please reach out to the MetroTime Admin team as soon as possible to correct this change.

Sincerely,

MetroTime Team

 Trigger➛...➛Number, Trigger➛...➛Requested by, Trigger➛...➛Role Type, Trigger➛...➛State

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛First name,

This email is to inform you that your MetroTime role has been updated to Trigger➛...➛Role Type. 

If this is correct, please review the Knowledgebase articles on how to properly perform your role. 

If this is incorrect, please reach out to the MetroTime Admin team as soon as possible to correct this change.

Sincerely,

MetroTime Team

 Trigger➛...➛Number, Trigger➛...➛Requested by, Trigger➛...➛Role Type, Trigger➛...➛State
